text: And He has disposed for you whatever is in the heavens of sun moon stars water and otherwise and whatever is in the earth of animals trees vegetation rivers and otherwise that is to say He created all that for your benefit all jamī‘an is for emphasis being from Him minhu is a circumstantial qualifier that is to say He has disposed them as something from Him exalted be He. Surely in that there are signs for a people who reflect on them and therefore believe.
